column7: Helps students to develop their skills in taking a spiritual history and addressing issues relating to faith; skills in end-of-life care; and understanding of whole person care. No graduate credit. 2 professional hours. Approved for S/U grading only. May be repeated in separate semesters to a maximum of 4 hours. Prerequisite: Restricted to students enrolled in the Carle Illinois Doctor of Medicine (MD) program.
